title: National and Islamic Moderate Party of Afghanistan
text:
National and Islamic Moderate Party of Afghanistan () is a <a href="political%20party">political party</a> in <a href="Afghanistan">Afghanistan</a>, led by <a href="Qarabeg%20Izadyar">Qarabeg Izadyar</a>.
At the time of foundation of the party, it was speculated that the party was intended to function as a back-up in case <a href="Yunus%20Qanuni">Yunus Qanuni</a>'s <a href="New%20Afghanistan%20Party">New Afghanistan Party</a> would have failed to obtain official registration.
